hero.subtitle: Send us a product link from any Georgian store. We find the same item abroad and deliver it to your door for significantly less.
hero.note: No payment required to check price. 100% free quote.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Getting a cheaper price is simpler than ordering food. Just three steps to save money.
how.step1d: Find a product on any Georgian site and paste the link here.
how.step2d: Our system finds an item abroad and calculates the full delivery cost.
how.step3d: Review our offer. If you like the savings, accept it and we handle the rest.

benefits.title: Why shop with Linky?
benefits.body1: We noticed that products in Georgia are often 30–50% more expensive than in Europe or the US.
benefits.body2: Linky bridges the gap by using smart sourcing to find the original product at its real market price, dealing with customs, and delivering it to you cheaper than local retail.
benefits.card1d: You can decline our offer anytime before payment. No questions asked.
benefits.card2d: Pay only a fraction upfront. The rest upon delivery to your door.
benefits.card3d: Forget complex shipping addresses. We handle logistics end-to-end.
benefits.card4d: The price we quote is final. No hidden customs fees or taxes later.

cta.title: Ready to check the real price?
cta.subtitle: Don't overpay. Paste your link and let us do the magic.
